Class RegressionDatasetBuilder

  • java.lang.Object

extends AbstractBuilder<RegressionDatasetBuilder>

                            List<Double> y,

        Parameters:
        dataset - dataset instance where adding data
        x - X values to add, values used to create the regression
        y - Y values to add, values used to create the regression
        asDate - if true, the dataset will manage Dates as X values
